UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Linking dual mode of action of host defense antimicrobial peptide thanatin: Structures, lipopolysaccharide and LptAm binding of designed analogs.
Literature.Author: Sinha S, Dhanabal VB, Sperandeo P, Polissi A, Bhattacharjya S

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=2µM),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=2µM),Streptococcus pyogenes ATCC 19615(MIC=2µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=1µM),Escherichia coli BL21(MIC=2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=2µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=4µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=2µM)
